message: Anyone got Convore working in an Erc-alike?
Not yet, but after attending CodeConf that's probably the first thing I'll be working on.
I looked into building a client for BitlBee, but ultimately gave up after realizing the mapping to IRC channels is a bit more complicated than you might think off the bat.
oh, wow, I figured I'd have to join to shoot my mouth off. neat. Anyway, how much more complicated is it?
every group is a channel. how do you map topics? #emacs@new-message-in... ? don't thinkit maps cleanly.
I was thinking more of moddeling it as every group is a server, and every topic is a channel.
Though I'm not actually looking to try and shoe-horn it into the ERC framework.
